Hyperpigmented skin has areas that are darker than others or darker than usual: When incorrectly used, lasers can burn and scar skin or leave it hyper-pigmented. A sun-induced freckle is a hyperpigmented lesion caused by natural or artificial ultraviolet light. Related word
hyperpigmentation
More examplesFewer examplesA small, 3 mm, dark, hyper-pigmented lesion was also seen in the gastric body.During long-term treatment, body areas exposed to sunlight may become hyper-pigmented. Hyperpigmented disorders tend to be very difficult to treat.
